00048 #  include "dualcon.h"

00050 
00051 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00052 {
00053     RemeshModifierData *rmd = (RemeshModifierData*) md;
00054 
00055     rmd->scale = 0.9;
00056     rmd->depth = 4;
00057     rmd->hermite_num = 1;
00058     rmd->flag = MOD_REMESH_FLOOD_FILL;
00059     rmd->mode = MOD_REMESH_SHARP_FEATURES;
00060     rmd->threshold = 1;
00061 }
00062 
00063 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00064 {
00065     RemeshModifierData *rmd = (RemeshModifierData*) md;
00066     RemeshModifierData *trmd = (RemeshModifierData*) target;
00067 
00068     trmd->threshold = rmd->threshold;
00069     trmd->scale = rmd->scale;
00070     trmd->hermite_num = rmd->hermite_num;
00071     trmd->depth = rmd->depth;
00072     trmd->flag = rmd->flag;
00073     trmd->mode = rmd->mode;
00074 }
00075 
00076 #ifdef WITH_MOD_REMESH
00077 
00078 static void init_dualcon_mesh(DualConInput *mesh, DerivedMesh *dm)
00079 {
00080     memset(mesh, 0, sizeof(DualConInput));
00081 
00082     mesh->co = (void*)dm->getVertArray(dm);
00083     mesh->co_stride = sizeof(MVert);
00084     mesh->totco = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00085 
00086     mesh->faces = (void*)dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00087     mesh->face_stride = sizeof(MFace);
00088     mesh->totface = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00089 
00090     dm->getMinMax(dm, mesh->min, mesh->max);
00091 }
00092 
00093 /* simple structure to hold the output: a CDDM and two counters to
00094  * keep track of the current elements */
00095 typedef struct {
00096     DerivedMesh *dm;
00097     int curvert, curface;
00098 } DualConOutput;
00099 
00100 /* allocate and initialize a DualConOutput */
00101 static void *dualcon_alloc_output(int totvert, int totquad)
00102 {
00103     DualConOutput *output;
00104 
00105     if (!(output = MEM_callocN(sizeof(DualConOutput),
00106                               "DualConOutput")))
00107         return NULL;
00108     
00109     output->dm = CDDM_new(totvert, 0, 0, 4*totquad, totquad);
00110     return output;
00111 }
00112 
00113 static void dualcon_add_vert(void *output_v, const float co[3])
00114 {
00115     DualConOutput *output = output_v;
00116     DerivedMesh *dm = output->dm;
00117     
00118     assert(output->curvert < dm->getNumVerts(dm));
00119     
00120     copy_v3_v3(CDDM_get_verts(dm)[output->curvert].co, co);
00121     output->curvert++;
00122 }
00123 
00124 static void dualcon_add_quad(void *output_v, const int vert_indices[4])
00125 {
00126     DualConOutput *output = output_v;
00127     DerivedMesh *dm = output->dm;
00128     MLoop *mloop;
00129     MPoly *cur_poly;
00130     int i;
00131     
00132     assert(output->curface < dm->getNumPolys(dm));
00133 
00134     mloop = CDDM_get_loops(dm);
00135     cur_poly = CDDM_get_poly(dm, output->curface);
00136     
00137     cur_poly->loopstart = output->curface * 4;
00138     cur_poly->totloop = 4;
00139     for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00140         mloop[output->curface * 4 + i].v = vert_indices[i];
00141     
00142     output->curface++;
00143 }
00144 
00145 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md,
00146                                   Object *UNUSED(ob),
00147                                   DerivedMesh *dm,
00148                                   int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00149                                   int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00150 {
00151     RemeshModifierData *rmd;
00152     DualConOutput *output;
00153     DualConInput input;
00154     DerivedMesh *result;
00155     DualConFlags flags = 0;
00156     DualConMode mode = 0;
00157 
00158     DM_ensure_tessface(dm); /* BMESH - UNTIL MODIFIER IS UPDATED FOR MPoly */
00159 
00160     rmd = (RemeshModifierData*)md;
00161 
00162     init_dualcon_mesh(&input, dm);
00163 
00164     if (rmd->flag & MOD_REMESH_FLOOD_FILL)
00165         flags |= DUALCON_FLOOD_FILL;
00166 
00167     switch(rmd->mode) {
00168     case MOD_REMESH_CENTROID:
00169         mode = DUALCON_CENTROID;
00170         break;
00171     case MOD_REMESH_MASS_POINT:
00172         mode = DUALCON_MASS_POINT;
00173         break;
00174     case MOD_REMESH_SHARP_FEATURES:
00175         mode = DUALCON_SHARP_FEATURES;
00176         break;
00177     }
00178     
00179     output = dualcon(&input,
00180                      dualcon_alloc_output,
00181                      dualcon_add_vert,
00182                      dualcon_add_quad,
00183                      flags,
00184                      mode,
00185                      rmd->threshold,
00186                      rmd->hermite_num,
00187                      rmd->scale,
00188                      rmd->depth);
00189     result = output->dm;
00190     MEM_freeN(output);
00191 
00192     CDDM_calc_edges(result);
00193     CDDM_calc_normals(result);
00194     return result;
00195 }
00196 
00197 #else /* !WITH_MOD_REMESH */
00198 
00199 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *UNUSED(md), Object *UNUSED(ob),
00200                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00201                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00202                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00203 {
00204     return derivedData;
00205 }
00206 
00207 #endif /* !WITH_MOD_REMESH */

00210     /* name */              "Remesh",
00211     /* structName */        "RemeshModifierData",
00212     /* structSize */        sizeof(RemeshModifierData),
00213     /* type */              eModifierTypeType_Nonconstructive,
00214     /* flags */             eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsMesh | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsEditmode,
00215     /* copyData */          copyData,
00216     /* deformVerts */       NULL,
00217     /* deformMatrices */    NULL,
00218     /* deformVertsEM */     NULL,
00219     /* deformMatricesEM */  NULL,
00220     /* applyModifier */     applyModifier,
00221     /* applyModifierEM */   NULL,
00222     /* initData */          initData,
00223     /* requiredDataMask */  NULL,
00224     /* freeData */          NULL,
00225     /* isDisabled */        NULL,
00226     /* updateDepgraph */    NULL,
00227     /* dependsOnTime */     NULL,
00228     /* dependsOnNormals */  NULL,
00229     /* foreachObjectLink */ NULL,
00230     /* foreachIDLink */     NULL,
00231 };
